aboutus.title_header: We make fitness social, measurable, and rewarding.
aboutus.title_desc: WinxFit is a next-generation fitness app that turns your daily movement into motivation. Join challenges, track progress in real time, and earn meaningful rewards. Whether you walk, run, or cycle, WinxFit makes every step count.

competitions.title_desc: Choose from hundreds of challenge types like steps, distance, or active minutes. Every event uses verified data for fair results and real-time progress tracking.

work_with.title_desc: WinxFit connects with your favorite devices ‚Äî Apple Health, Google Fit, Fitbit, Strava, and Garmin ‚Äî to keep your progress accurate and automatic.

timetracker.title_desc: Watch your stats update live as you move. WinxFit connects directly with your device to show real-time ranks, streaks, and challenge progress while maintaining fair play.

membership.title_header: <bold>Unlock advanced features</bold> with Premium ‚Äî create custom challenges, access analytics, and earn higher rewards.
